history.content:
Flying into the Future: Drone Technology for Commercial Use

Presented by Alpha Epsilon Zeta
Once only thought to have uses in covert military operations, drones have transformed from the world of science fiction into today’s must-have technology. From applications in agriculture to delivering packages to taking stunning videos, drones are revolutionizing the way we live our lives. Join our highly accomplished panelists to help usher in this new generation of technology.
 
When: Tuesday, April 14 | 7:30 PM - 9:00 PM
Where: 112 Wurster Hall
 
We are excited to introduce the following speakers at our event:
  • Mr. Nicholas Pilkington, Co-Founder and CTO at DroneDeploy (https://www.dronedeploy.com/)
  • Mr. Robert Morris, CEO at TerrAvion (http://www.terravion.com/)
  • Mr. Ariel Seidman, Founder and CEO of Hivemapper (http://hivemapper.com/)
  • Dr. Davide Venturelli, Founder of Archon Dronistics (http://www.archondronistics.com/)
Professor Raja Sengupta, Moderator and Professor of Civil Engineering at Berkeley
-----------------------
Free Food will be provided from our sponsors:
Seniore’s Pizza
Noah’s Bagels
CREAM!
-----------------------
RESUMES ARE ACCEPTED!
----------
history.subject: Flying into the Future: Drone Technology for Commercial Use
